name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Gregory CLARK

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Gregory CLARK.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
McDERMOTT, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Gaele McLaughlin Barthold, Deputy Dist. Atty., Ronald Eisenberg, Chief/Appeals Div., Richard W. Goldberg, Philadelphia, for appellant.
John W. Packel, Chief/Appeals Div., Peter Rosalsky, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
508 A.2d 1196
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Gregory CLARK.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 17, 1986.
Decided April 29, 1986.
Gaele McLaughlin Barthold, Deputy Dist. Atty., Ronald Eisenberg, Chief/Appeals Div., Richard W. Goldberg, Philadelphia, for appellant.
John W. Packel, Chief/Appeals Div., Peter Rosalsky, Philadelphia, for appellee.
